text: Iman Aghapour (born January 22, 1989, in Jouybar, Iran) is an Iranian martial artist. He has represented Iran in international competitions in combat jiu- jitsu, MMA, and pankration. == Career highlights == * 2015 – Gold medal, MMA Championships, Armenia * 2017 – Gold medal, Combat Jiu-Jitsu World Championships, Croatia * 2022 – Silver medal, Asian Combat Jiu-Jitsu Championships, Uzbekistan * 2023 – Bronze medal, World Pankration Championships, Tashkent, Uzbekistan * 2023 – Qualified for the 2023 Martial Arts Olympics in Riyadh == References ==
title: Iman Aghapour (athlete)
